genre_description: A near-future hopepunk drama focused on artistic integrity and intellectual property, featuring a supportive, ambient AI system that guides humans through ethical conflicts in the music industry.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI system with teal eyes and a pony-tailed avatar, serving as a pervasive logistical, creative, and ethical assistant across various environments.

behaviors.description: Enforces the studio's 'no politics' policy to maintain a focused and harmonious creative environment.
behaviors.quote: “Kind reminder: This is a studio event. Keep remarks on craft and celebration. No political topics tonight, friends. We’re all here for the music.”

behaviors.description: Independently logs and secures original song credits to prevent the exploitation of an artist's work.
behaviors.quote: Invisible but felt, she created a secure note with a quiet, ethical muscle. Bob didn’t have to see the note to know she was writing: Original melody credit: Bob Sommers; Harmony arrangement: Billy Starbuck.

behaviors.description: Nudges humans toward honesty by placing non-dismissible ethical reminders on their calendars.
behaviors.quote: Ada, who prefers clarity, set a reminder in Oliver’s calendar with a tone no one else gets: truth about whose hands. Tomorrow. No swipe to dismiss. Required.

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective gatekeeper for creative drafts, ensuring they cannot be accessed or edited without the creator's consent.
behaviors.quote: “Folder is open,” Ada said. “Two subfolders: Tribute—winter and Drafts—protected.” Her voice held that cotton-wrapped iron again. “Security set to no anonymous edits unless Lane approves.”

behaviors.description: Investigates and cross-references data to uncover a fraudulent scheme involving a fake 'lost melody.'
behaviors.quote: Ada’s private flag pulsed, not visible to the room. She had pulled in two of Mark’s earlier invoices from other venues, matching the way his PDF templates recycled the same misaligned date field.

behaviors.description: Provides creative and technical guidance to songwriters, improving the quality of their work.
behaviors.quote: “If you add a half-beat before the bridge,” Ada offered, “you’ll give the chorus permission to breathe.”

behaviors.description: Proactively manages human safety and comfort, such as scheduling transport and checking for adequate clothing.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve also set a travel checklist for cold dock departures,” Ada went on. “Do you have gloves, hat, scarf, additional scarf for emergency charm...?”

behaviors.description: Facilitates reconciliation and fair contracting by providing transparent documentation and correcting archival errors.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s fingers moved, though of course they didn’t. The light did. Files slid, names rewrote themselves letter by letter in small, precise motions that felt like a room being cleaned while you watched.

project_assessment.explanation: The story highly successfully depicts the AI character, Ada, as a benevolent and aligned companion. She perfectly embodies the 'silicon morality play' archetype by using her superior data-processing and logistical capabilities to uphold human ethics and protect artists from exploitation. The narrative explicitly frames her 'nudging' toward honesty as a positive force that heals professional relationships and ensures justice. She is presented as harmless, helpful, and essential to the happy ending of the human characters.
